titleStmt.title: The religion of the Church of England, the surest establishment of the royal throne with the unreasonable latitude which the Romanists allow in point of obedience to princes : in a letter occasioned by some late discourse with a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Randal Taylor and John Williams, Junior ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Laurence Womock. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
